code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./components.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ImageUpload(_ref){let{onImageUpload}=_ref;const[selectedFile,setSelectedFile]=useState(null);const handleFileChange=event=>{setSelectedFile(event.target.files[0]);};const handleUpload=()=>{if(selectedFile){const formData=new FormData();formData.append('file',selectedFile);axios.post('http://localhost:8000/upload',formData).then(response=>{onImageUpload(response.data);}).catch(error=>console.error('Error uploading image:',error));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"image-upload-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Upload Image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",accept:"image/jpeg, image/png, image/tiff",onChange:handleFileChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"upload-button",onClick:handleUpload,children:"Upload Image"})]});}export default ImageUpload;
